Package org.apache.taverna.server.master.worker

A Taverna Server back-end that works by forking off workflow executors.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CompletionNotifier
    How to convert a notification about the completion of a job into a message.
    FactoryBean
    What the remote run really needs of its factory.
    PolicyLimits
    The worker policy delegates certain limits to the state model of the particular worker.
    RunDBSupport
    The interface to the database of runs.
    WorkerModel
    Profile of the getters and setters in a worker system.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PasswordIssuer
    A simple password issuing bean.
    RemoteRunDelegate
    Bridging shim between the WebApp world and the RMI world.
    RunConnection
    The representation of the connections to the runs that actually participates in the persistence system.
    RunDatabase
    The main facade bean that interfaces to the database of runs.
    RunDatabaseDAO
    This handles storing runs, interfacing with the underlying state engine as necessary.
    RunFactoryConfiguration  
    SecurityContextDelegate
    Implementation of a security context.
    SecurityContextFactory
    Singleton factory.
    SimpleFormattedCompletionNotifier
    Completion notifier that sends messages by email.
    VelocityCompletionNotifier  

Package org.apache.taverna.server.master.worker Description

A Taverna Server back-end that works by forking off workflow executors.
